title: UDOIT
creator: University of Central Florida
description: UDOIT Cloud scans online Canvas course content, identifies possible accessibility issues, and guides designers and faculty in repairing those issues using Universal Design principles.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
